Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, 130th and Eberhart due to police activity near 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, 130th and Eberhart due to police activity near 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
